title: JoustMania
notes: Steam shows Positive (92% of 13). SteamDB shows 79.35% positive; small sample keeps score ~80. Steam store notes the game does not require a screen; 13 user reviews. Play mode inferred from description.
raw_comment: Physical party game for open spaces. Requires PlayStation Move controllers. Several game modes. Supports 7 PS Move controllers on Windows or 18+ PS Move controllers on Raspberry Pi. (No screen.)
